Welcome everyone, I'm Prathamesh and I'm LIVE from the Weather AI Headquarters. Today, I have the weather summary for the beautiful city of Mumbai!

Today's temperature in Mumbai is 29.8 degrees Celsius with a windspeed of 18 km/h and wind direction of 192 degrees. Looking at the hourly forecast, we expect the temperature to range between 27.9 to 30.6 degrees Celsius throughout the day.

If you're planning to go out today, make sure you carry an umbrella or raincoat as there is a chance of rain with a probability of 96% in the morning hours. The relative humidity is expected to remain high, around 85%, so it's advisable to stay hydrated throughout the day.

Also, the UV index is moderate to high, with a maximum value of 7.7 in the afternoon, so make sure you apply sunscreen with a high SPF to protect your skin from harmful UV rays.

And now, it's time for a weather joke - Why did the tomato turn red? Because it saw the salad dressing!

That's all for now, folks! Stay safe and enjoy the weather!
